verbs.description: [ARG0: roosevelt university] [V: announces] [ARG1: successful debt restructuring] [ARGM-MNR: with preston hollow capital chicago- business wire -oct 25 2018-roosevelt university a leading higher education institution dedicated to social justice and to making higher education available to all students who qualify academically regardless of their background] today announced that it has completed a successful debt restructuring that provides significant relief from debt service obligations and allows the university to reallocate funds towards completion of its turnaround plan the refinancing which closed in late september included refunding of 195 million of debt preston hollow capital stone point capital illinois finance authority andrew harris debt restructuring mayer brown chief financial officer columbia capital chairman and ceo wells fargo securities debt columbia capital management chicago wells fargo university restructuring roosevelt katten muchin rosenman jim thompson stone point capital llc roosevelt university
